Fingerprint Armor (Altered).name: Fingerprint Armor (Altered)
Fingerprint Armor (Altered).summary: Deformed armor of a mad knight in despair
description: Iron armor singed and blistered by fingers.
Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold.
No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy.
Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?

Consort's Mask.name: Consort's Mask
Consort's Mask.summary: White mask of Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor
description: Mask worn by Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor, in the image of a foreign queen.
Increases dexterity.
Long ago, when Rykard first set eyes on Tanith, she was working as a dancer in a foreign land. Soon, he made her his consort.
She was the only human to remain by his side when he became the serpent of blasphemy.
In that moment, Tanith was truly charmed by him.

Consort's Robe.name: Consort's Robe
Consort's Robe.summary: Dress of Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor
description: Fine robe of white silk worn by Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor.
Long ago, when Rykard first set eyes on Tanith, she was working as a dancer in a foreign land. Soon, he made her his consort.
She was the only human to remain by his side when he became the serpent of blasphemy.
In that moment, Tanith was truly charmed by him.

Consort's Trousers.name: Consort's Trousers
Consort's Trousers.summary: Skirt of Tanith, Lady of the Volcano Manor
description: Fine white trousers, perfectly suited for wearing beneath a silk robe.

Ruler's Mask.name: Ruler's Mask
Ruler's Mask.summary: Stone mask of Rya, servant to the Volcano Manor
description: Mask in the image of a wizened sage.
Customary dress among lords in a smaller nation.
Increases faith.
Such a mask illustrates the qualities of an ideal lord: chiefly, wise and possessing a certain defanged geniality.
One at the center of society often finds these qualities most expedient.

Ruler's Robe.name: Ruler's Robe
description: Luxurious robe worn by lords in a smaller nation.
Its fine blue mantle serves to prove its wearer's status.

Upper-Class Robe.name: Upper-Class Robe
description: Embroidered, bright green robe worn by noble children.
Donning such a robe is traditionally the child's first show of burgeoning independence.

Marais Mask.name: Marais Mask
Marais Mask.summary: An eerie white haired silver mask
description: Mask in the image of a white-haired young noble.
Customarily worn by the head of House Marais.
Increases arcane.
The Marais family has a dual history spanning generations, serving as both executioners and castellans of the Shaded Castle. This mask bears the likeness of the first of their line.

Marais Robe.name: Marais Robe
Marais Robe.summary: Noble's cape woven with sturdy fabric
description: Robe with a black mantle across the shoulders.
Customarily worn by the head of House Marais.
The sons of House Marais are all sickly born.
Little wonder that Maleigh Marais would be so beguiled by the beautiful and fierce goddess who was born into rot.

Bloodsoaked Manchettes.name: Bloodsoaked Manchettes
Bloodsoaked Manchettes.summary: Noble's waistcloth woven with sturdy fabric
description: Manchettes formed from tightly-wound bandages soaked through with blood.
Any protection is welcome for the festering arms beneath.

Bloodsoaked Mask.name: Bloodsoaked Mask
description: Mask formed from tightly-wound bandages soaked through with blood.
Even the most ghastly cover is more inviting than the festering face beneath.

Official's Attire.name: Official's Attire
Official's Attire.summary: Noble's gown woven with sturdy fabric
description: Grubby blue robe worn by magisterial officials to carry out their grim tasks.
Surveillance, executions, gruesome rituals… The darkest duties drive the wheels of mankind.

Omen Helm.name: Omen Helm
Omen Helm.summary: Mask of a curse gnawed Omen
description: Malformed helm resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.
Worn by the Dung Eater, its form is a vision of the landscape of his mind, and of his appearance as he wished to see it.
The heart of an Omen without the body to match; could there be any crueler existence?
What does it matter, then, if the curse claims it all?

Omen Armor.name: Omen Armor
Omen Armor.summary: Armor of a curse gnawed Omen
description: Malformed armor resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.
Worn by the Dung Eater.
The heavy, sun-shaped medallion represents both the guidance he once saw, and the ring to which it will one day lead.

Omen Gauntlets.name: Omen Gauntlets
Omen Gauntlets.summary: Gauntlets of a curse gnawed Omen
description: Malformed gauntlets resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.
Worn by the Dung Eater, their form is a vision of the landscape of his mind, and of his appearance as he wished to see it.
The heart of an Omen without the body to match; could there be any crueler existence?
What does it matter, then, if the curse claims it all?

Omen Greaves.name: Omen Greaves
Omen Greaves.summary: Greaves of a curse gnawed Omen
description: Malformed greaves resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.
Worn by the Dung Eater, their form is a vision of the landscape of his mind, and of his appearance as he wished to see it.
The heart of an Omen without the body to match; could there be any crueler existence?
What does it matter, then, if the curse claims it all?

Carian Knight Helm.name: Carian Knight Helm
description: Helm of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.
The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were all heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.

Carian Knight Armor.name: Carian Knight Armor
description: Armor of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.
The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were all heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.

Carian Knight Gauntlets.name: Carian Knight Gauntlets
description: Gauntlets of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.
The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were all heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.

Carian Knight Greaves.name: Carian Knight Greaves
description: Greaves of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.
The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were all heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.

Carian Knight Armor (Altered).name: Carian Knight Armor (Altered)
description: Armor of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.
The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were all heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.

Hierodas Glintstone Crown.name: Hierodas Glintstone Crown
Hierodas Glintstone Crown.summary: Eyepatch worn by a great sorcerer turned hermit
description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.
Increases intelligence and endurance to the detriment of FP.
The crown of Hierodas was granted to scholars who engaged in nomadic study away from the academy.

Errant Sorcerer Robe.name: Errant Sorcerer Robe
Errant Sorcerer Robe.summary: Cape worn by a great sorcerer turned hermit
description: Commonplace robe made of thick cloth.
Worn by the Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm, one of the first Tarnished to visit Roundtable Hold.

A silent seeker of sorcery, who had gone so far as to make contact with the primeval current, Wilhelm was led by guidance into confrontation with his friend Vargram, and it is said that he was then taken prisoner in Roundtable Hold.

Errant Sorcerer Manchettes.name: Errant Sorcerer Manchettes
Errant Sorcerer Manchettes.summary: Arm wraps worn by a great sorcerer turned hermit
description: Commonplace leather manchettes.
Their hands are inlaid with dulled glintstone.

Errant Sorcerer Boots.name: Errant Sorcerer Boots
Errant Sorcerer Boots.summary: Shoes worn by a great sorcerer turned hermit
description: Commonplace leather boots, sturdy enough to withstand a long journey.

Errant Sorcerer Robe (Altered).name: Errant Sorcerer Robe (Altered)
Errant Sorcerer Robe (Altered).summary: Tunic worn by a great sorcerer turned hermit
description: Commonplace robe made of thick cloth.
Worn by the Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm, one of the first Tarnished to visit Roundtable Hold.

A silent seeker of sorcery, who had gone so far as to make contact with the primeval current, Wilhelm was led by guidance into confrontation with his friend Vargram, and it is said that he was then taken prisoner in Roundtable Hold.

Haima Glintstone Crown.name: Haima Glintstone Crown
Haima Glintstone Crown.summary: Mask of an unaffiliated glintstone sorcerer
description: One of the glintstone crowns bestowed upon Raya Lucaria scholars whose pursuits were deemed worthy.
Increases intelligence and strength to the detriment of FP.
Scholars of the Haima Conspectus sought the power to quell conflict, and to this end studied the sorceries of cannon fire and the gavel.

Battlemage Robe.name: Battlemage Robe
Battlemage Robe.summary: Robe of an unaffiliated glintstone sorcerer
description: Robe worn by scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy scholar, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.
Whenever war broke out and the academy sealed its gates, only Haima's scholars dared venture outside.
Seclusion is no way to foster discovery; it is only a convenient form of escape.

Battlemage Manchettes.name: Battlemage Manchettes
Battlemage Manchettes.summary: Arm wraps of an unaffiliated glintstone sorcerer
description: Manchettes worn by scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.

Battlemage Legwraps.name: Battlemage Legwraps
Battlemage Legwraps.summary: Waistcloth of an unaffiliated glintstone sorcerer
description: Legwraps worn by scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.

Snow Witch Hat.name: Snow Witch Hat
description: Witch's pointed hat, frigid and frozen through.
Of a style associated with practitioners of heretical sorcery.
Strengthens cold sorcery.
Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries.
It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her.
That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.

Snow Witch Robe.name: Snow Witch Robe
description: Witch's robe in the color of snow.
Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries.
It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her.
That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.

Snow Witch Skirt.name: Snow Witch Skirt
description: Witch's skirt in the color of snow.
Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries.
It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her.
That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.

Snow Witch Robe (Altered).name: Snow Witch Robe (Altered)
description: Witch's robe in the color of snow.
Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries.
It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her.
That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.

Traveler's Clothes.name: Traveler's Clothes
description: Light yet sturdy clothes.
Worn by young women who set off into the world to confront their fate.

Traveler's Manchettes.name: Traveler's Manchettes
description: Light yet sturdy leather manchettes.
Worn by young women who set off into the world to confront their fate.

Traveler's Boots.name: Traveler's Boots
description: Light yet sturdy leather boots.
Worn by young women who set off into the world to confront their fate.

Juvenile Scholar Cap.name: Juvenile Scholar Cap
Juvenile Scholar Cap.summary: Cap worn by students of the Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Cap worn by young academy scholars, the juveniles birthed anew by the amber egg of Queen Rennala, the head of Raya Lucaria Academy.
Yet their rebirth is not without imperfections, and thus do they repeat the process, eventually becoming utterly dependent upon it.
Rebirth is as sleep to them, and with each awakening, memory fades into oblivion.

Juvenile Scholar Robe.name: Juvenile Scholar Robe
Juvenile Scholar Robe.summary: Robe worn by students of the Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Robe worn by young academy scholars, the juveniles birthed anew by the amber egg of Queen Rennala, the head of Raya Lucaria Academy.
Yet their rebirth is not without imperfections, and thus do they repeat the process, eventually becoming utterly dependent upon it.
Rebirth is as sleep to them, and with each awakening, memory fades into oblivion.

Radiant Gold Mask.name: Radiant Gold Mask
Radiant Gold Mask.summary: Mask worn by researchers of the Golden Order
description: A mask designed to resemble a blazing golden halo.
Created and left behind by Lord Goldmask, a staunch pursuer of Golden Order fundamentalism.
Strengthens Golden Order incantations.
Its striking design represents both the brilliant inspiration that once shone upon him, and the vision of a ring that he will surely find at the end of his pursuit.
"To you who seek to shine as I do, wear it well!"

Goldmask's Rags.name: Goldmask's Rags
Goldmask's Rags.summary: Robe worn by researchers of the Golden Order
description: Worn rags that just barely cover the body.
Lord Goldmask felt no draw to the vain excesses of clothing; what use is finery to one who seeks greater brilliance?

Gold Bracelets.name: Gold Bracelets
Gold Bracelets.summary: Arm wraps worn by researchers of the Golden Order
description: Bracelets made in the image of Erdtree branches.
Minimal adornments made by Lord Goldmask's disciples.
Those disciples have long since left him.

Gold Waistwrap.name: Gold Waistwrap
Gold Waistwrap.summary: Waistcloth worn by researchers of the Golden Order
description: Waistwrap made in the image of Erdtree branches.
A minimal adornment made by Lord Goldmask's disciples.
Those disciples have long since left him.

Fell Omen Cloak.name: Fell Omen Cloak
Fell Omen Cloak.summary: Robe worn by Morgott, the Elden Lord
description: A cloak of ragged fur worn about the exposed body of Margit, the Fell Omen.
Having slaughtered countless champions during the Shattering, the Fell Omen has become a horror to those who harbor ambitions for the Erdtree, or for Lordship.

Albinauric Mask.name: Albinauric Mask
Albinauric Mask.summary: Helm modeled after the silent Frog People
description: Mask made from the largely unaltered hide of a young Albinauric.
Raises arcane, but reduces the HP recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears.
A far cry from godskin, this Albinauric hide mask is the product of malicious mockery.

locations.summary: hidden room with a lone Omenkiller
locations.directions: Head to the rooftop of the building with Guest Hall site of grace, drop from the western side onto a balcony to find a hidden room.

Dirty Chainmail.name: Dirty Chainmail
Dirty Chainmail.summary: Chainmail worn by the silent Frog People
description: Chainmail worn by young Albinaurics.
The appearance of a protruding belly provides no benefits worthy of note.

Zamor Mask.name: Zamor Mask
Zamor Mask.summary: Mask worn by an ancient hero
description: Mask worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants.
These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

Zamor Armor.name: Zamor Armor
Zamor Armor.summary: Armor worn by an ancient hero
description: Armor worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants.
These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

Zamor Bracelets.name: Zamor Bracelets
Zamor Bracelets.summary: Arm wraps worn by an ancient hero
description: Bracelets worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants.
These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

Zamor Legwraps.name: Zamor Legwraps
Zamor Legwraps.summary: Waistcloth worn by an ancient hero
description: Legwraps worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants.
These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

Imp Head (Cat).name: Imp Head (Cat)
Imp Head (Cat).summary: Ancient mask with an animal motif
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.
Resembling a cat, it holds trace amounts of feline intelligence.

Imp Head (Fanged).name: Imp Head (Fanged)
Imp Head (Fanged).summary: Ancient mask with an animal motif
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.
Resembling a fanged demon, it holds trace amounts of bestial strength.

Imp Head (Long-Tongued).name: Imp Head (Long-Tongued)
Imp Head (Long-Tongued).summary: Ancient mask with an animal motif
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.
Resembling a long-tongued demon, it holds trace amounts of vexatious dexterity.

Imp Head (Corpse).name: Imp Head (Corpse)
Imp Head (Corpse).summary: Ancient mask with an animal motif
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.
Resembling the visage of a corpse, it holds trace amounts of lingering faith.

Imp Head (Wolf).name: Imp Head (Wolf)
Imp Head (Wolf).summary: Ancient mask with an animal motif
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.
Resembling a wolf, it holds trace amounts of lupine endurance.

Imp Head (Elder).name: Imp Head (Elder)
Imp Head (Elder).summary: Ancient mask with an animal motif
description: Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem.
Resembling an elder, it holds trace amounts of arcane knowledge.

Silver Tear Mask.name: Silver Tear Mask
Silver Tear Mask.summary: Head covering formed from silver tears
description: Mask fashioned from the corpse of a formless Silver Tear, supported by its hardened, shed husk.
Greatly increases arcane to the detriment of physical attack power.
To imitate the imitator is a cunning play indeed.

Chain Coif.name: Chain Coif
description: Coif made of woven chain.
Standard issue for ordinary soldiers.
Though plain in appearance, it offers dependable protection.

Chain Armor.name: Chain Armor
Chain Armor.summary: Chest piece made of woven chain
description: Armor made of woven chain.
Standard issue for ordinary soldiers.
Though plain in appearance, it offers dependable protection.

Chain Gauntlets.name: Chain Gauntlets
description: Gauntlets worn by ordinary soldiers.
Though plain in appearance, they offer dependable protection.

Chain Leggings.name: Chain Leggings
description: Leggings made of woven chain.
Standard issue for ordinary soldiers.
Though plain in appearance, they offer dependable protection.

Greathelm.name: Greathelm
description: Sturdy greathelm made from iron.
Though it is uncomfortably heavy and obstructs the vision of the wearer, it provides considerable damage negation.

Eye Surcoat.name: Eye Surcoat
Eye Surcoat.summary: Iron armor with a surcoat attached
description: Brown surcoat draped over chainmail.
The insignia emblazoned on the front marks out the wearer as the eyes and ears of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.

Tree Surcoat.name: Tree Surcoat
Tree Surcoat.summary: Iron armor with a blue surcoat attached
description: Blue surcoat draped over chainmail.
The tree insignia emblazoned on the front depicts the Erdtree, and is a design beloved throughout the Lands Between.

Octopus Head.name: Octopus Head
Octopus Head.summary: Helm modeled after a Land Octopus
description: A land octopus whelp worn directly on the head.
Has a lingering warmth reminiscent of human skin.
Those who can withstand the smell will find its organic elasticity excellent for negating strikes.

Jar.name: Jar
Jar.summary: This sturdy jar might serve well as a helm
description: Jar that fits cleanly over the head when upturned.
Made with pride by Iron Fist Alexander.
In a uniquely jarlike gesture of friendship, it boosts the power of throwing pot items.

Mushroom Head.name: Mushroom Head
Mushroom Head.summary: Helm with slime mold growing on it
description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body.
These overgrown mushrooms have colonized the head.
To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.

Mushroom Body.name: Mushroom Body
Mushroom Body.summary: Armor with slime mold growing on it
description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body.
These overgrown mushrooms have colonized the torso.
To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.

Mushroom Arms.name: Mushroom Arms
Mushroom Arms.summary: Arm wraps with slime mold growing on them
description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body.
These overgrown mushrooms have colonized the arms.
To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.

Mushroom Legs.name: Mushroom Legs
Mushroom Legs.summary: Leg wraps with slime mold growing on it
description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body.
These overgrown mushrooms have colonized the legs.
To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.

Nox Mirrorhelm.name: Nox Mirrorhelm
Nox Mirrorhelm.summary: Shining helm decorated with a mirror
description: Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass.
One among the Eternal City's ritual implements.
Easily broken and weak against striking attacks.
Worn by those committed to high treason, it wards off the intervention of the Greater Will and its vassal Fingers.

Iji's Mirrorhelm.name: Iji's Mirrorhelm
Iji's Mirrorhelm.summary: Shining helm decorated on all sides with mirrors
description: Helm fashioned from a crystal looking-glass, said to have never left War Counselor Iji's head.
Easily broken and weak against striking attacks.
Worn by those committed to high treason, it wards off the intervention of the Greater Will and its vassal Fingers.
Iji was afraid. Terrified of his own treachery.

Black Hood.name: Black Hood
description: Hood of lusterless black fabric that conceals its wearer's identity.
In this world, there is very little that must necessarily be known.

Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
Leather Armor.summary: Dirty leather armor worn by bandits
description: Lightweight and battle-proven leather armor worn by a savvy soldier.
Many admire the wearer of this armor for his chivalrous and forthright spirit.

Leather Gloves.name: Leather Gloves
description: Lightweight and battle-proven leather gloves worn by a savvy soldier.
Many admire the wearer of this armor for his chivalrous and forthright spirit.

Leather Boots.name: Leather Boots
description: Lightweight and battle-proven leather boots worn by a savvy soldier.
Many admire the wearer of this armor for his chivalrous and forthright spirit.

Bandit Mask.name: Bandit Mask
description: Mask of black cloth that covers the mouth.
Favored by bandits for hiding their faces, it also provides some protection against poison.

Knight Helm.name: Knight Helm
Knight Helm.summary: Iron helm worn by foreign knights
description: Iron helm of an unknown knight.
It is made of thin iron plate.
Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.

Knight Armor.name: Knight Armor
Knight Armor.summary: Iron armor worn by foreign knights
description: Iron armor of an unknown knight.
It is made of thin iron plate.
Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.

Knight Gauntlets.name: Knight Gauntlets
Knight Gauntlets.summary: Iron gauntlets worn by foreign knights
description: Iron gauntlets of an unknown knight.
It is made of thin iron plate.
Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.

Knight Greaves.name: Knight Greaves
Knight Greaves.summary: Iron greaves worn by foreign knights
description: Iron greaves of an unknown knight.
It is made of thin iron plate.
Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.

Greathood.name: Greathood
description: Hood far larger than the head it is meant to cover.
A burial shroud of sorts for those who discover, at long last, the truth they sought.
Increases intelligence and faith to the detriment of HP.
"Yes, surely this is the moon that young Rennala gazed upon."

Godrick Soldier Helm.name: Godrick Soldier Helm
description: Helm worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
Made from durable iron, layered with a chainmail coif beneath.

Tree-and-Beast Surcoat.name: Tree-and-Beast Surcoat
description: Armor worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
The surcoat depicts the distant Erdtree and the beast regent, an emblem of the golden lineage.
Both are symbols of glory now past.

Godrick Soldier Gauntlets.name: Godrick Soldier Gauntlets
description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Godrick Soldier Greaves.name: Godrick Soldier Greaves
description: Greaves worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Raya Lucarian Helm.name: Raya Lucarian Helm
Raya Lucarian Helm.summary: Helm used by Raya Lucaria Academy Knights
description: Helm worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers.
Its brow is adorned with a single cuckoo's feather.

Cuckoo Surcoat.name: Cuckoo Surcoat
Cuckoo Surcoat.summary: Armor used by Raya Lucaria Academy Knights
description: Armor worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers.
The surcoat depicts twinned cuckoos peering into a flourishing mass of glintstone.
To a glintstone sorcerer, the body is a transient thing. The Cuckoo alone knows its insignificance, yet watches over it all the same.

Raya Lucarian Gauntlets.name: Raya Lucarian Gauntlets
Raya Lucarian Gauntlets.summary: Gauntlets used by Raya Lucaria Academy Knights
description: Gauntlets worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Raya Lucarian Greaves.name: Raya Lucarian Greaves
Raya Lucarian Greaves.summary: Greaves used by Raya Lucaria Academy Knights
description: Greaves worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Leyndell Soldier Helm.name: Leyndell Soldier Helm
description: Helm worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
Made from durable iron, layered with a chainmail coif beneath.

Erdtree Surcoat.name: Erdtree Surcoat
description: Armor worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
The surcoat bears a majestic likeness of the Erdtree. Its golden backing is an honor bestowed on no other soldiers.

Leyndell Soldier Gauntlets.name: Leyndell Soldier Gauntlets
description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Leyndell Soldier Greaves.name: Leyndell Soldier Greaves
description: Greaves worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Radahn Soldier Helm.name: Radahn Soldier Helm
Radahn Soldier Helm.summary: Helm used by Caelid Wilds Knights
description: Helm worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.
Its visor is fashioned after a lion's fangs.

Redmane Surcoat.name: Redmane Surcoat
Redmane Surcoat.summary: Armor used by Caelid Wilds Knights
description: Armor worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.
The surcoat depicts a red-maned lion raising a sword in the image of Radahn. Thus, they were Redmanes, and all proved they were worthy of the name.

Radahn Soldier Gauntlets.name: Radahn Soldier Gauntlets
Radahn Soldier Gauntlets.summary: Gauntlets used by Caelid Wilds Knights
description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Radahn Soldier Greaves.name: Radahn Soldier Greaves
Radahn Soldier Greaves.summary: Greaves used by Caelid Wilds Knights
description: Greaves worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Mausoleum Surcoat.name: Mausoleum Surcoat
description: Armor worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.
The surcoat depicts the mausoleum bell, which rings in constant mourning for the soulless demigods.

Mausoleum Gauntlets.name: Mausoleum Gauntlets
description: Gauntlets worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Mausoleum Greaves.name: Mausoleum Greaves
description: Greaves worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Haligtree Helm.name: Haligtree Helm
Haligtree Helm.summary: Helm used by Knights of Miquella
description: Helm worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.
An iron helm graced by a crown of unalloyed gold.
Increases faith.

Haligtree Crest Surcoat.name: Haligtree Crest Surcoat
Haligtree Crest Surcoat.summary: Armor used by Knights of Miquella
description: Armor worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.
The surcoat bears the crest of the Haligtree.
Though watered with Miquella's own blood since it was a sapling, the Haligtree ultimately failed to grow into an Erdtree.

Haligtree Gauntlets.name: Haligtree Gauntlets
Haligtree Gauntlets.summary: Gauntlets used by Knights of Miquella
description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Haligtree Greaves.name: Haligtree Greaves
Haligtree Greaves.summary: Greaves used by Knights of Miquella
description: Greaves worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.
Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

Gelmir Knight Helm.name: Gelmir Knight Helm
description: Helm worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard.
Its crest of red feathers symbolizes Rykard's pedigree as Lord Radagon's son.

Gelmir Knight Armor.name: Gelmir Knight Armor
description: Armor worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard.
It bears an emblem that none wear any longer, standing as it does for a lord that fell from lofty ambition into gluttonous depravity.
As the lord lost his dignity, so too did these knights lose their master.

Gelmir Knight Gauntlets.name: Gelmir Knight Gauntlets
description: Gauntlets worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard.
Time has yet to dull their luster.

Gelmir Knight Greaves.name: Gelmir Knight Greaves
description: Greaves worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard.
Time has yet to dull their luster.

Gelmir Knight Armor (Altered).name: Gelmir Knight Armor (Altered)

It bears an emblem that none wear any longer, standing as it does for a lord that fell from lofty ambition into gluttonous depravity.
As the lord lost his dignity, so too did these knights lose their master.

Godrick Knight Helm.name: Godrick Knight Helm
Godrick Knight Helm.summary: Helm used by Stormveil Elite Knights
description: Helm worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
Adorned with a plume of withered, ashen hair.

Godrick Knight Armor.name: Godrick Knight Armor
Godrick Knight Armor.summary: Armor used by Stormveil Elite Knights
description: Armor worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted.
Its left breast is emblazoned with a two-headed war axe, an emblem of the golden lineage.
The knights surely boasted of their strength in days long gone.

Godrick Knight Gauntlets.name: Godrick Knight Gauntlets
Godrick Knight Gauntlets.summary: Gauntlets used by Stormveil Elite Knights
description: Gauntlets worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted.

Its left breast is emblazoned with a two-headed war axe, an emblem of the golden lineage.
The knights surely boasted of their strength in days long gone.

Cuckoo Knight Helm.name: Cuckoo Knight Helm
Cuckoo Knight Helm.summary: Helm of Raya Lucaria Academy Elite Knights
description: Helm worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.
Its brow is adorned with a single cuckoo's feather.

Cuckoo Knight Armor.name: Cuckoo Knight Armor
Cuckoo Knight Armor.summary: Armor of Raya Lucaria Academy Elite Knights
description: Armor worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.
Its left breast is emblazoned with a peering cuckoo, whence came their name.
Perhaps the bird's shrewd gaze is an expression of their refusal to be mere servants of the academy.

Cuckoo Knight Gauntlets.name: Cuckoo Knight Gauntlets
Cuckoo Knight Gauntlets.summary: Gauntlets of Raya Lucaria Academy Elite Knights
description: Gauntlets worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.

Leyndell Knight Helm.name: Leyndell Knight Helm
Leyndell Knight Helm.summary: Helm used by Elite Capital Knights
description: Helm worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
The golden canopy represents the honor of standing among the tree's defenders.

Leyndell Knight Armor.name: Leyndell Knight Armor
Leyndell Knight Armor.summary: Armor used by Elite Capital Knights
description: Armor worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
Its left breast is emblazoned with a symbol of Erdtree Worship, said to have once been imbued with an incantation of protection.

Leyndell Knight Gauntlets.name: Leyndell Knight Gauntlets
Leyndell Knight Gauntlets.summary: Gauntlets used by Elite Capital Knights
description: Gauntlets worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.

Leyndell Knight Greaves.name: Leyndell Knight Greaves

Leyndell Knight Armor (Altered).summary: Armor used by Elite Capital Knights
description: Armor worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.
Its left breast is emblazoned with a symbol of Erdtree Worship, said to have once been imbued with an incantation of protection.

Redmane Knight Helm.name: Redmane Knight Helm
Redmane Knight Helm.summary: Helm used by Elite Caelid Wilds Knights
description: Helm worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side.
The red plume is a symbol of Radahn's pedigree as Lord Radagon's son - the mane of the proud Red Lion.

Redmane Knight Armor.name: Redmane Knight Armor
Redmane Knight Armor.summary: Armor used by Elite Caelid Wilds Knights
description: Armor worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side.
When they were driven to defeat by Malenia's scarlet rot, the Redmane Knights burned the crest on the left breast of their armor to indicate their resolve.
"Alas, dear home, I shan't see you again! For our duty is to remain here, a bulwark against the blight."

Redmane Knight Gauntlets.name: Redmane Knight Gauntlets
Redmane Knight Gauntlets.summary: Gauntlets used by Elite Caelid Wilds Knights
description: Black iron gauntlets worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side. Time has yet to dull their luster.

Redmane Knight Greaves.name: Redmane Knight Greaves
Redmane Knight Greaves.summary: Greaves used by Elite Caelid Wilds Knights
description: Black iron greaves worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side. Time has yet to dull their luster.

Mausoleum Knight Armor.name: Mausoleum Knight Armor
Mausoleum Knight Armor.summary: Armor used by Elite Mausoleum Knights
description: Armor worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.

The wing-shaped ornaments on its back evoke the Deathbird. A self-inflicted curse that ties the spirits of these loyal knights to the land, having willingly beheaded themselves so that they may serve their masters in death.

Mausoleum Knight Gauntlets.name: Mausoleum Knight Gauntlets
Mausoleum Knight Gauntlets.summary: Gauntlets used by Elite Mausoleum Knights
description: Gauntlets worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.

Foot Soldier Cap.name: Foot Soldier Cap
description: Flanged iron cap widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.

Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.

Foot Soldier Gauntlets.name: Foot Soldier Gauntlets

Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.

Foot Soldier Tabard.summary: Armor used by Raya Lucaria Academy Soldiers

Scarlet Tabard.name: Scarlet Tabard
Scarlet Tabard.summary: Armor used by Caelid Wilds Patrol Soldiers
description: Padded cloth armor with the telltale stains of the scarlet rot.
Worn by foot soldiers in General Radahn's army.

Bloodsoaked Tabard.name: Bloodsoaked Tabard
description: Padded cloth armor with indelible bloodstains around the neck.
Worn by headless foot soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.

Sacred Crown Helm.name: Sacred Crown Helm
description: Flanged iron cap adorned with a crown of unalloyed gold.
Increases faith.
Worn by foot soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.
Who is it that Miquella shall bless, if not the low and the meek?

Ivory-Draped Tabard.name: Ivory-Draped Tabard
description: Padded cloth armor with a shawl in the color of ivory draped over the shoulders.
Worn by foot soldiers sworn to the Haligtree.

Omensmirk Mask.name: Omensmirk Mask
description: Mask with long, hideously twisted horns worn by the Omenkillers.
Increases strength.
Bears the smirking face of an elder, twisted in wicked delight.
This visage is carved in the image of the evil spirits that haunt the Omen in their nightmares.

Omenkiller Robe.name: Omenkiller Robe
description: Robe worn by the Omenkillers, butchers of twisted conscience.
Its thick apron is worn in remembrance of Rollo, the progenitor of the Omenkillers and a perfumer of antiquity.

Omenkiller Long Gloves.name: Omenkiller Long Gloves
description: Long, stiff leather gloves worn by the Omenkillers.

Omenkiller Boots.name: Omenkiller Boots
description: Stiff leather boots worn by the Omenkillers.

Ash-of-War Scarab.name: Ash-of-War Scarab
Ash-of-War Scarab.summary: Mask made from a large, old white scarab's body
description: Gray scarab worn directly on the head.
These scarabs roll clumps of Ashes of War during their labors.
Slightly reduces the FP cost of skills, but increases damage taken.

Incantation Scarab.name: Incantation Scarab
description: Golden scarab worn directly on the head.
These scarabs roll clumps of incantations during their labors.
Slightly reduces the FP costs of incantations, but increases damage taken.
As a scarab approaches death, it abandons its rolled treasure and stretches its wings wide for the long journey to its home nest.

Glintstone Scarab.name: Glintstone Scarab
description: Blue-green scarab worn directly on the head.
These scarabs roll clumps of sorcery during their labors.
Slightly reduces the FP costs of sorceries, but increases damage taken.

Crimson Tear Scarab.name: Crimson Tear Scarab
Crimson Tear Scarab.summary: Mask made from a large, old yellow scarab's body
description: Red scarab worn directly on the head.
The red scarabs roll clumps of crimson tears during their labors.
Slightly increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears, but increases damage taken.

Cerulean Tear Scarab.name: Cerulean Tear Scarab
Cerulean Tear Scarab.summary: Mask made from a large, old green scarab's body
description: Blue scarab worn directly on the head.
These scarabs roll clumps of cerulean tears during their labors.
Slightly increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Cerulean Tears, but increases damage taken.

Deathbed Dress.name: Deathbed Dress
Deathbed Dress.summary: Dress worn by Phia, the Deathbed Companion
description: Extremely thin and sheer white dress worn by the Deathbed Companion as she embraces the dead.
Slowly replenishes the HP of nearby allies, but not that of the wearer.
The touch of the fabric is exceedingly soft, so as not to harm even the most withered corpse, while still sharing her warmth.

Deathbed Smalls.name: Deathbed Smalls
Deathbed Smalls.summary: Skirt worn by Phia, the Deathbed Companion
description: Skirt worn by Phia, the Deathbed Companion.

Fia's Hood.name: Fia's Hood
Fia's Hood.summary: Hood worn by Phia, the Deathbed Companion
description: Hood of black cloth that covers the whole head.
Worn by Fia, the Deathbed Companion, on her journey after being exiled from her home.
The fabric itself is soft as silk.

Fia's Robe.name: Fia's Robe
Fia's Robe.summary: Robe worn by Phia, the Deathbed Companion
description: Robe of black cloth that covers the entire body.
Worn by Fia, the Deathbed Companion, on her journey after being exiled from her home.
The fabric itself is soft as silk and thin enough that those embraced can feel every pulse; every bit of her warmth.

Fia's Robe (Altered).name: Fia's Robe (Altered)
Fia's Robe (Altered).summary: Gown worn by Phia, the Deathbed Companion
description: Robe of black cloth that covers the entire body.
Worn by Fia, the Deathbed Companion, on her journey after being exiled from her home.
The fabric itself is soft as silk and thin enough that those embraced can feel every pulse; every bit of her warmth.

Millicent's Robe.name: Millicent's Robe
Millicent's Robe.summary: Robe worn by Millicent the Rotting
description: Robe worn by Millicent the Rotting

Millicent's Gloves.name: Millicent's Gloves
Millicent's Gloves.summary: Gloves worn by Millicent the Rotting
description: Gloves worn by Millicent the Rotting

Millicent's Boots.name: Millicent's Boots
Millicent's Boots.summary: Boots worn by Millicent the Rotting
description: Boots worn by Millicent the Rotting

Millicent's Tunic.name: Millicent's Tunic
Millicent's Tunic.summary: Tunic worn by Millicent the Rotting
description: Tunic worn by Millicent the Rotting

Golden Prosthetic.name: Golden Prosthetic
Golden Prosthetic.summary: Golden prosthetic forged using ancient techniques
description: Golden prosthetic forged using ancient techniques

Highwayman Hood.name: Highwayman Hood
Highwayman Hood.summary: Hood worn by cave-dwelling foot soldiers
description: Hideously stained and ragged hood.
Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.

Highwayman Cloth Armor.name: Highwayman Cloth Armor
Highwayman Cloth Armor.summary: Robe worn by cave-dwelling foot soldiers
description: Hideously stained and ragged cloth armor.
Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.

Highwayman Gauntlets.name: Highwayman Gauntlets
Highwayman Gauntlets.summary: Gloves worn by cave-dwelling foot soldiers
description: Hideously stained and dented gauntlets.
Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.

High Page Hood.name: High Page Hood
High Page Hood.summary: Hood of a Page loyal to a certain noble family
description: Hood of a page selected for special privileges by the noble they serve.
The unassuming sack-like appearance befits their unseen and unknown stature.

High Page Clothes.name: High Page Clothes
High Page Clothes.summary: Garb of a Page loyal to a certain noble family
description: Clothes of a page selected for special privileges by the noble they serve.
Traveling wear tailored with exquisite precision, to avoid any undue shame for the page's master.

High Page Clothes (Altered).name: High Page Clothes (Altered)
High Page Clothes (Altered).summary: Vest of a Page loyal to a certain noble family
description: Clothes of a page selected for special privileges by the noble they serve.
Traveling wear tailored with exquisite precision, to avoid any undue shame for the page's master.

Rotten Duelist Helm.name: Rotten Duelist Helm
Rotten Duelist Helm.summary: Scarlet-bronze helm adorned with many snakes
description: Bronze helm decorated with innumerable snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot.
Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum.
The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.

Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak.name: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak
Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak.summary: Robe fashioned from the pelt of a deadly beast
description: Thick, bristly cloak eaten through by scarlet rot.
The symbol of an underground gravekeeper's station.

Rotten Duelist Greaves.name: Rotten Duelist Greaves
description: Greaves wrapped with bronze snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot.
Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum.
The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.

Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak (Altered).name: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak (Altered)
description: Cloak wrapped with bronze snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot.
Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum.
The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.

Mushroom Crown.name: Mushroom Crown
Mushroom Crown.summary: Garland crown of large flowers rotted by poison
description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body.
These overgrown mushrooms form a towering headpiece.
Raises attack power when something nearby suffers from poison or rot.
Long ago, great lords served the scarlet rot. Perhaps such fungal bodies served as their crowns.

Black Dumpling.name: Black Dumpling
Black Dumpling.summary: Red cloth blindfold used to cover prisoners' eyes
description: Mask forced on a victim's head to lend torture an extra degree of cruelty.
It magnifies one's fears and makes them acutely aware of all forms of pain.
Raises attack power when the wearer suffers from madness.
When the Black Dumpling goes on, the torturer no longer seeks answers; only to inflict suffering without hope of relief.

Lazuli Robe.name: Lazuli Robe
Lazuli Robe.summary: Sorcerer's robe, dyed in a beautiful cerulean hue
description: Robe worn by scholars of the Lazuli Conspectus, singular among the greater Raya Lucaria Academy.
These scholars, who sought to master Carian sorcery, instead learned to see the moon as equal to the stars.
This robe, in the hue of the full moon, signifies their heresy.
